name: Speedy Car - Endless Rush
description:
Fasten your seat belts and get your cars rolling!
Orangenose Studio, the team behind the insanely challenging #1 hit - Hardest Game Ever 2 - offers you its newest casual driving game — SPEEDY CAR!
Dominate the road as you drive your way through the city while avoiding rushing vehicles.
Be extra careful not to get crashed at intersections and railroad crossings though!

MASTER THE ART OF DRIVING:
Press and hold the control buttons to accelerate and to change lanes
Release to break
Collect coins and upgrade your car to perfection!
New awesome cars are available; make sure you have enough dough to purchase them all!
Sounds cool? Well, try it to find out!
ENJOY THE RIDE AT FULL SPEED!
